game.name: Sacrificio
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A nerve wrecking struggle against industrialized human sacrifice, and a army of flesh husks in the deepest reaches of human understanding.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A nerve wrecking struggle against industrialized human sacrifice, and a army of flesh husks in the deepest reaches of human understanding.
